Class KdTreeFloat<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • whitebox.structures.KdTreeFloat<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KdTreeFloat.Manhattan, KdTreeFloat.SqrEuclid, KdTreeFloat.WeightedManhattan, KdTreeFloat.WeightedSqrEuclid

    public abstract class KdTreeFloat<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An efficient well-optimized kd-tree
